algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by taking the logarithm of the remaining capacity divided by the maximum capacity, then multiplying it by the remaining capacity divided by the maximum capacity.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    remaining_capacity = bins - item
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    scores = np.log(remaining_capacity / max_capacity) * (remaining_capacity / max_capacity)
    sorted_indices = np.argsort(scores)[::-1]
    scores = scores[sorted_indices]
    
    return scores
